message: Hello Bob, I am pleased to offer you our premium product at an exclusive price of $14000. This is a special opportunity considering its value to you is $12000. I believe this offer strikes a balance between fairness and maximizing my earnings.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12500. I'm really interested in the product, but I have a budget constraint. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle.
